function.summary: Transforms English province or country names into 2-character codes specified in Appendix A of EDGARLink Online XML Technical Specification (https://www.sec.gov/info/edgar/specifications/edgarlinkonlinexml.htm). Initial character of each word may be upper or lower case.

documentation.xhtml:p: Transforms English province or country names (as of Version 27, April 2019 of EDGARLink Online XML Technical Specification). Some words optional when in the official name ("the" and trailing words not customarily used even though in the ISO name). Some synonyms in the expression (USA, UK or Great Britain, etc).

input.name: input
input.xhtml:p:
Province or country code from a province or country name expression, such as the following:
Source ExpressionTransformed Value
AfghanistanB2
afghanistanB2
American SamoaB5
Georgia2Q

output.xhtml:p: The value in xs:token (corresponding to value space of fact type dei:edgarStateCountryItemType).
